title: Haldi Ceremony (Invitation Only)
description: Traditional turmeric ceremony with music and rituals. The Haldi & Mehndi events will not have a change of attire between them, please dress for the full duration.
attire: Clothes you're comfortable in (and okay if they get stained!) and choose comfortable footwear.

title: Mehndi Ceremony (Invitation Only)
description: Traditional henna art ceremony with music and food. The Haldi & Mehndi events will not have a change of attire between them, please dress for the full duration.

title: Baraat - (Groom Side Only)
description: The groom's arrival with music, dancing, and lots of excitement.
location: The River Center at Saluda Shoals

title: Baraat Arrival
description: The groom and his family arrive in a festive procession and are welcomed by the bride's family. This moment symbolizes the joyful union of two families and the start of the wedding ceremony.
location: The River Center at Saluda Shoals

title: Wedding Ceremony
description: Traditional Hindu wedding ceremony with rituals and prayers. Indian attire examples can be found on the FAQ page.
attire: Modest clothing, Indian or cocktail attire. Please do not wear red or white.
location: The River Center at Saluda Shoals

title: Cocktail Hour
description: Cocktails and appetizers before the reception.
location: The River Center at Saluda Shoals

title: Wedding Reception
description: Dinner, dancing, and celebration. Indian attire examples can be found on the FAQ page.
location: The River Center at Saluda Shoals
